content:
Yes, it is likely that we will see more technology designed to promote positive character traits in the future. As people become more aware of the impact of technology on their lives and society, there is an increasing demand for technology that is designed to foster positive behaviors and traits.

Moreover, companies interested in socially responsible tech are investing in and taking steps towards incorporating character-building features into technological devices.

In summary, as awareness of the effects of technology on character development continues to rise, the dialogue around designing interventions to promote positive character traits is set to continue growing, and we should see more companies developing technological aids that promote desirable character traits to enhance the quality of life of the general public.
